title: Your Account
subTitle: Has Been Banned
p1: We’re writing to inform you that your Huber account has been banned due to a violation of our Community Guidelines.
p2: This action was taken after a report was submitted and carefully reviewed by our moderation team. The decision was made based on the following reason:
p3: Use of vulgar, aggressive, racist... words.
p4: Ask for personal or sensitive information.
p5: We understand this may be disappointing, and we’re here to support fair and respectful communication across Hulib.
